Trade/Device Name(s): OneTouch Verio Flex Blood Glucose Monitoring System
OneTouch Verio Flex™ Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Submitter Information: LifeScan Europe, a Division of Cilag GmbH International
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): OneTouch Verio Flex Blood Glucose Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for OneTouch Verio Flex Blood Glucose Monitoring System for self-testing of blood glucose in diabetic patients using fresh capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood drawn from the fingertip for self-testing by individuals with diabetes at home as an aid to monitor diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
